 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפֵץ‎</span> **verb** ==delight in== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be mindful of, attentive to, keep, protect***, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> whence <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***eager, zealous***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***anger*** (excitement), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***enrage*** (Aramaic and Arabic of ***excited*** attention, Hebrew of ***delighted*** attention), [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 168</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG 1886, 742</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵפֶץ‎</span> weakened to ***thing***, see [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Ec. Glossary</sup>, Phoenician in proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חפצבעל‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Gen.34.19|Gen 34:19]] + 28 t.; feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפֵ֑צָה‎</span> [[Isa.66.3|Isa 66:3]]?; 2 masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפַצְתָּ‎</span> [[Deut.21.14|Deut 21:14]] + 4 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפָ֫צְנוּ‎</span> [[Job.21.14|Job 21:14]], etc., + 14 t. Perfect; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְפֹּץ‎</span> [[Deut.25.7|Deut 25:7]] + 7 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶחְפָּ֑ץ‎</span> [[Ps.37.23|Ps 37:23]]; [[Ps.147.10|Ps 147:10]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְפְּצוּ‎</span> [[Isa.13.17|Isa 13:17]]; [[Jer.6.10|Jer 6:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶחְפָּ֑צוּ‎</span> [[Ps.68.31|Ps 68:31]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶחְפָּצוּ֑ן‎</span> [[Isa.58.2|Isa 58:2]] (twice in verse) etc. + 9 t. Imperfect; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפֹץ‎</span> [[Ezek.18.23|Ezek 18:23]] on ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפֵץ‎</span> = adjective verb., see below; — 

**1.** of ***men:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***take pleasure in, delight in***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, a woman [[Gen.34.19|Gen 34:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.21.14|Deut 21:14]]; [[Esth.2.14|Esth 2:14]] a man [[1Sam.18.22|1Sam 18:22]]; [[1Sam.19.1|1Sam 19:1]]; [[2Sam.20.11|2Sam 20:11]] in matters and things [[2Sam.24.3|2Sam 24:3]]; [[Isa.13.17|Isa 13:17]]; [[Isa.66.3|Isa 66:3]]; [[Jer.6.10|Jer 6:10]]; [[Ps.109.17|Ps 109:17]]; [[Ps.112.1|Ps 112:1]]; [[Ps.119.35|Ps 119:35]]; [[Prov.18.2|Prov 18:2]]; [[Esth.6.6|Esth 6:6]]; [[Esth.6.7|Esth 6:7]]; [[Esth.6.9|Esth 6:9]] (twice in verse); [[Esth.6.11|Esth 6:11]] with accusative [[Ps.68.31|Ps 68:31]]; [[Isa.58.2|Isa 58:2]]; [[Eccl.8.3|Eccl 8:3]] implicit object [[Ps.73.25|Ps 73:25]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***delight, desire, be pleased*** to do a thing, ***would*** do it [[Deut.25.7|Deut 25:7]]; [[Deut.25.8|Deut 25:8]]; [[1Kgs.9.1|1Kgs 9:1]]; [[Esth.6.6|Esth 6:6]]; [[Ruth.3.13|Ruth 3:13]]; [[Ps.40.9|Ps 40:9]]; [[Job.9.3|Job 9:3]]; [[Job.13.3|Job 13:3]]; [[Job.21.14|Job 21:14]]; [[Job.33.32|Job 33:32]]; [[Isa.58.2|Isa 58:2]]; [[Jer.42.22|Jer 42:22]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד שֶׁתֶּחְפָּ֑ץ‎</span> ***until it please*** (of love) [[Song.2.7|Song 2:7]]; [[Song.3.5|Song 3:5]]; [[Song.8.4|Song 8:4]]. 

**2.** ***of God:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***delight in, have pleasure in***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, persons [[Num.14.8|Num 14:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Sam.15.26|2Sam 15:26]]; [[2Sam.22.20|2Sam 22:20]] = [[Ps.18.20|Ps 18:20]], [[1Kgs.10.9|1Kgs 10:9]] = [[2Chr.9.8|2Chr 9:8]]; [[Ps.22.9|Ps 22:9]]; [[Ps.41.12|Ps 41:12]]; [[Isa.62.4|Isa 62:4]] not in the strength of a horse [[Ps.147.10|Ps 147:10]] in doing evil [[Mal.2.17|Mal 2:17]] in the death of the sinner [[Ezek.18.32|Ezek 18:32]]; [[Ezek.33.11|Ezek 33:11]] but in mercy, justice, and righteousness [[Jer.9.23|Jer 9:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בחר באשׁר (לא) חפצתי‎</span> [[Isa.56.4|Isa 56:4]]; [[Isa.65.12|Isa 65:12]]; [[Isa.66.4|Isa 66:4]] not with (accusative) the blood of bullocks [[Isa.1.11|Isa 1:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זבח (ים ׅ‎</span>; [[Ps.40.7|Ps 40:7]]; [[Ps.51.18|Ps 51:18]]; [[Ps.51.21|Ps 51:21]], or the death of the sinner [[Ezek.18.23|Ezek 18:23]] (twice in verse); but with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חסד‎</span> [[Hos.6.6|Hos 6:6]]; [[Mic.7.18|Mic 7:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמת‎</span> [[Ps.51.8|Ps 51:8]] with the way of a man [[Ps.37.23|Ps 37:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כל אשׁר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חפץ‎</span> [[Ps.115.3|Ps 115:3]]; [[Ps.135.6|Ps 135:6]]; [[Prov.21.1|Prov 21:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר חפץ‎</span> [[Isa.55.11|Isa 55:11]]; [[Jonah.1.14|Jonah 1:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***pleased*** to do a thing with infinitive [[Judg.13.23|Judg 13:23]]; [[1Sam.2.25|1Sam 2:25]]; [[Isa.53.10|Isa 53:10]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** with imperfect subject ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:142»§ 142</sup> (3) c) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפֵץ יגדיל תּורה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***Yahweh was pleased to magnify teaching*** [[Isa.42.21|Isa 42:21]]. — On [[Job.40.17|Job 40:17]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפַץ‎</span>. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==bend down== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhMAAbAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAwABsAAAJtjI+py+0Po5y0WgjAdRrnvCkfiIzG2IUnWrIBqbaMGYdpzTUwvnyTz3vdSqJhsLg7PlzKFlB4ciYTxh4qBdpdq1NrR/t8rZhQL22Llj67QrT7fT1Ux+9lvKibB9ls5TTcJOcWOJNGaNZ3qOhQAAA7"> ***lower, depress***, as wings Qor 15:88) — only **Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְפֹּץ זְנָבוֺ כְמוֺאֶֿרֶז‎</span> [[Job.40.17|Job 40:17]] ***he bendeth down (extendeth down stiffly) his tail like a cedar***, see [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]] in [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>[[Job.52|Job 52]]6</sup> [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]<sup>Hiob 299</sup>.
